div.ab:
أسْعد سعد رريّس الوفقي
حملين ويبين قمح نقي
وأيضا فردتين رز وابثتهم وأثبتهم المسيّر
للفقيه علي وأبو علي نعمان
إلي شونة أبو مُــفــرّج غلّة نقيّة
وكيل جيّد

ʾasʿad saʿd rayyis ăl wafqiyyi
ḥimlayni waybayni qamḥ naqiyy
wa ʾayḍ:an fardatayni ruzz wa ʾaṯbit hum ăl musayyaru
li l faqīhi ʿaliyy:in wa ʾabū ʿaliyy:in nuʿmāna
ʾilà šūnaẗi ʾabū mufarriǧ:in ġallaẗ:un naqiyyaẗ:un
wa kayl:un ǧayyid:un

[To be dispatched from so-and-so, in the company of] Asʿad Rayyis al-Wafqī are:
two loads, which weigh two waybas, of pure wheat;
also two fardas of rice. Please verify them. The cargo
is for the jurist ʿAlī and Abū ʿAlī Nuʿmān.
To be delivered to the warehouse of Abū Mufarrij are fine crops,
and a good scale. in full measures.
